title:
Groups elementarily equivalent to metabelian Baumslag$-$Solitar groups
  and regular bi-interpretability
abstract:
We prove that metabelian Baumslag$-$Solitar group $BS(1,k)$, $k>1$, is
(strongly) regularly bi-interpretable with the ring of integers $\mathbb{Z}$,
and describe in algebraic terms all groups that are elementarily equivalent to
$BS(1,k)$.
